Considering its unique features and benefits, I would like to offer you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,080,000. I am confident that this investment will provide substantial returns and meet your business objectives. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,080,000.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,080,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
